main.name: Ghulam Mustafa
main.description: Passionate Software Engineer and confident individual who loves to take challenges and explore new things.
main.bio: Greetings, I am a passionate software engineer having several years of working experience in providing IT services to many local and international clients. I possess adequate experience to become a part of the software development stages such as designing, developing and testing. Exploring and learning new things, passionate about developing web and mobile apps, active presence in social communities, always eager to know about new tech and trends related to computer science. A passionate and enthusiastic person who like to meet new people and love to cater different challenges and solve them through my abilities.
main.contactmessage: DISCUSS A PROJECT OR JUST WANT TO SAY HI? MY INBOX IS OPEN FOR ALL.

testimonials.text: Very responsive to communication. Delivery was well within expectations. Some very good , prudent, improvement suggestions were made that made the app better. Quality was excellent.
After a pleasant previous experience I was happy to return with more work. Delivery was quick and quality of work was good. Recommend!
